description: Numeric semantics should reject using a time literal where an integer is expected for credit hours
Numeric semantics should reject using a time literal where an integer is expected for enrollment
Numeric semantics should reject using an identifier where an integer is expected for enrollment cap
Numeric semantics should reject using a quoted string where an integer is expected for credit hours
Numeric semantics should reject using a day keyword where an integer is expected for enrollment
Time semantics should reject using a bare integer where a time literal is expected
Time semantics should reject using an identifier where a time literal is expected
Time semantics should reject a time range where only one side is a valid time literal
Time semantics should reject a time range built from identifiers instead of time literals
String semantics should reject using a bare integer where a text value is expected for professor
String semantics should reject using a time literal where a text value is expected for subject
String semantics should reject using a bare integer where a course number string is expected
String semantics should reject using a bare integer where a method string is expected
Day semantics should reject using a bare integer where a boolean/text flag is expected
Day semantics should reject using a time literal where a boolean/text flag is expected
Day semantics should reject using a time literal where a boolean flag is expected for monday
Day semantics should reject using a string value where a boolean flag is expected for monday
